meaningMnemonic: You try to use your <radical>fingers</radical> to cast <radical>doubt</radical> on people by using them to <kanji>imitate</kanji> each other. Right now you're using your fingers as finger puppets, imitating one of your friends to the others.
readingMnemonic: Everyone thinks the friend you were trying to <kanji>imitate</kanji> is the imitation now and they have them in a <reading>gui</reading>llotine (ぎ). You even doubt if they're an imitation or if your fingers are the imitation.
